aka: DON’T LET THE SUN GO UP ON ME

director.name: 埃斯迈·埃勒·穆迪尔 Asmae El Moudir

trans_title: DON’T LET THE SUN GO UP ON ME
introduction: This is the story of Habib, a father who discovers his daughter’s illness through his passion for cinema. He is then forced to change his life and adapt to it. The archival images that this father was able to capture with his small video camera are the expression of an intimate life that he spontaneously filmed since the birth of his daughter Fatimazahra whose features have been completely changed.
